utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Hi, I'm looking to book a table for Korean fod.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Ok, what area are you thinking about?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Somewhere in Southern NYC, maybe the East Village?

segments.text: Southern NYC, maybe the East Village

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Ok, great.  There's Thursday Kitchen, it has great reviews.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: That's great. So I need a table for tonight at 7 pm for 8 people. We don't want to sit at the bar, but anywhere else is fine.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: They don't have any availability for 7 pm.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: What times are available?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: 5 or 8.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Yikes, we can't do those times.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Ok, do you have a second choice?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Let me check.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Ok.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Lets try Boka, are they free for 8 people at 7?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Yes.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Great, let's book that.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Ok great, are there any other requests?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: No, that's it, just book.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Great, should I use your account you have open with them?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Yes please.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Great. You will get a confirmation to your phone soon.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Hi I would like to see if the Movie What Men Want is playing here.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Yes it's showing here would you like to purchase a ticket?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Yes, for me and a friend so two tickets please

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: What time is that moving playing today?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: That movie is showing at 4, 5, and 8pm.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Okay. Is there anymore movies showing around 8pm

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Yes , showing at 8pm is Green Book.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: What is that about?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: It's about two men dealing with racisim.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Oh, no can you recommend anything else?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: What do you like?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Well I like movies that are funny.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Like comedies?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Well no I like action as well.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay. How to train your dragon is playing at 8pm.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Okay can i get two tickets for that ?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: So you want me to cancel the tickets for What men want ?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Yes please.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay, no problem.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: How much will this cost.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: You said two adult tickets?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Yes.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay, that will be $20.80

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Okay.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Anything else I can help you with ?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Yes can i bring my own food to theater.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: No, sorry you have to purchase food in the lobby.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Okay that is fine.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Thank you enjoy your movie

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: I want to watch avengers endgame

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: where do you want to watch it at?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: at bangkok close the hotel I a currently staying

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: sounds good, what time do you want to watch the movie?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: 8 o'clock

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: how many tickets?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: two

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: and should we use the account we already have with the movie theater?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: yes

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: It seems they do not have any movie at that time

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: let's watch another movie then

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: what other movie do you want to watch

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: let's watch how to train your dragon

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: the newest one

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: yes, that one

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: I don't think that movie is playing at that time either

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: so neither choices are playing at the time I want to watch

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: I am afraid so

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: I am no longer interested in watching the movie

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: very well, have a great day sir

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: thank you

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: you are welcome

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: I want to order a pizza from Bertuccis in Chelmsford, MA

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: what type of pizza would you like?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: a silano

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: what size

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: a large please

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: understood. will do

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: thanks

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: unfortunately bertuccis has run out of broccoli and so are not offering the silano style pizza today

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: I see

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: would you like a different type of pizza?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: yes. i would like a sporkie pizza

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: what size would you like?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: large

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: ok. I have confirmed your order for a large sporkie pizza at the bertuccis in chelmsford, ma

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: very good

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: would you like anything else?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: no thank you

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: you will be receiving a text message on your phone confirming the details of your order including the receipt and will be ready for pick up in 25 minutes

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: great. thank you so much

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: you're welcome. glad i could be of assistance

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Hi I'd like to order two large pizzas.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Sure, what kind of pizzas to you have in mind?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: I'll have a Hawaiian please.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: sure, is there anything else I can get for you?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Yes, I'd like a large meat lover pizza please.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: I am sorry, we're currently out of the meat lover pizza. Is there anything else you'd like instead?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Sure. I'd like a buffalo chicken pizza please.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Sure thing. What size do you want your buffalo chicken pizza?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Large please.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: What kind of crust do you want for your Hawaiian pizza?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Hand tossed please.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: What kind of crust do you want for you buffalo chicken pizza?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Also hand tossed please.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: thank you very much. Is there anything else I can get for you?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: No, that's it for today. Thank you

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: My pleasure. So we have a large, hand tossed crust buffalo chicken pizza and a large hand tossed crust Hawaiian pizza. Is that correct?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Perfect

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: So your total today will be $25

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Sounds good

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Awesome. Can I have a name for the order please?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: It's John Doe

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Can I also have a phone number for order update?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: sure it123456789

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: ok, thank you very much. Your order will be ready to pick up in 25 minutes

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: sounds good. Thank you

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: My pleasure
